summary: An ordinance amending Sections 18 and 19, as heretofore amended, of Ordinance No. 45382, and adding thereto two new sections to be known respectively as Section 2L and Section 17M, said ordinance being entitled: "An ordinance regulating and restricting the location of trades and industries; regulating and limiting the use of buildings and premises and the height and size of buildings; providing for yards, courts, or other open spaces; establishing districts for the said purposes; defining offenses; prescribing penalties and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict therewith", approved June 28, 1923.
